properties.Description: Replication protected item custom data details.

policyId.Description: The ID of Policy governing this PE.

protectedItemType.Description: The type of protected item type.

primaryFabricFriendlyName.Description: The friendly name of the primary fabric.

recoveryFabricFriendlyName.Description: The friendly name of recovery fabric.

recoveryFabricId.Description: The Arm Id of recovery fabric.

primaryProtectionContainerFriendlyName.Description: The name of primary protection container friendly name.

recoveryProtectionContainerFriendlyName.Description: The name of recovery container friendly name.

activeLocation.Description: The Current active location of the PE.

allowedOperations.Description: The allowed operations on the Replication protected item.

replicationHealth.Description: The consolidated protection health for the VM taking any issues with SRS as well as all the replication units associated with the VM's replication group into account. This is a string representation of the ProtectionHealth enumeration.

failoverHealth.Description: The consolidated failover health for the VM.

policyFriendlyName.Description: The name of Policy governing this PE.

lastSuccessfulTestFailoverTime.Description: The Last successful test failover time.

currentScenario.Description: Current scenario details of the protected entity.

failoverRecoveryPointId.Description: The recovery point ARM Id to which the Vm was failed over.

fabricObjectId.Description: The fabric specific object Id of the virtual machine.

protectedManagedDisks.Description: The list of protected managed disks.

recoveryAzureVMSize.Description: The size of recovery virtual machine.

recoveryAzureVMName.Description: The name of recovery virtual machine.

vmSyncedConfigDetails.Description: Azure to Azure VM synced configuration details.

monitoringPercentageCompletion.Description: The percentage of the monitoring job. The type of the monitoring job is defined by MonitoringJobType property.

monitoringJobType.Description: The type of the monitoring job. The progress is contained in MonitoringPercentageCompletion property.

lastHeartbeat.Description: The last heartbeat received from the source server.

isReplicationAgentUpdateRequired.Description: A value indicating whether replication agent update is required.

vmProtectionState.Description: The protection state for the vm.

vmProtectionStateDescription.Description: The protection state description for the vm.

lifecycleId.Description: An id associated with the PE that survives actions like switch protection which change the backing PE/CPE objects internally.The lifecycle id gets carried forward to have a link/continuity in being able to have an Id that denotes the "same" protected item even though other internal Ids/ARM Id might be changing.

testFailoverRecoveryFabricObjectId.Description: The test failover fabric object Id.

rpoInSeconds.Description: The last RPO value in seconds.

lastRpoCalculatedTime.Description: The time (in UTC) when the last RPO value was calculated by Protection Service.

resyncRequired.Description: A value indicating whether resync is required for this disk.

monitoringPercentageCompletion.Description: The percentage of the monitoring job. The type of the monitoring job is defined by MonitoringJobType property.

monitoringJobType.Description: The type of the monitoring job. The progress is contained in MonitoringPercentageCompletion property.

dataPendingInStagingStorageAccountInMB.Description: The data pending for replication in MB at staging account.

dataPendingAtSourceAgentInMB.Description: The data pending at source virtual machine in MB.

recoveryAzureResourceGroupId.Description: The recovery disk resource group Arm Id.

resyncRequired.Description: A value indicating whether resync is required for this disk.

monitoringPercentageCompletion.Description: The percentage of the monitoring job. The type of the monitoring job is defined by MonitoringJobType property.

monitoringJobType.Description: The type of the monitoring job. The progress is contained in MonitoringPercentageCompletion property.

dataPendingInStagingStorageAccountInMB.Description: The data pending for replication in MB at staging account.

dataPendingAtSourceAgentInMB.Description: The data pending at source virtual machine in MB.

recoveryNicIpAddressType.Description: IP allocation type for recovery VM.

id.Description: The ARM Id of the role assignment.

name.Description: The name of the role assignment.

enableRDPOnTargetOption.Description: The selected option to enable RDP\SSH on target vm after failover. String value of {SrsDataContract.EnableRDPOnTargetOption} enum.

useManagedDisks.Description: A value indicating whether managed disks should be used during failover.

recoveryAzureLogStorageAccountId.Description: The ARM id of the log storage account used for replication. This will be set to null if no log storage account was provided during enable protection.

vmProtectionState.Description: The protection state for the vm.

vmProtectionStateDescription.Description: The protection state description for the vm.

selectedRecoveryAzureNetworkId.Description: The selected recovery azure network Id.

sourceVmRAMSizeInMB.Description: The RAM size of the VM on the primary side.

sourceVmCPUCount.Description: The CPU count of the VM on the primary side.

licenseType.Description: License Type of the VM to be used.

targetDiskLocation.Description: Blob uri of the Azure disk.

lunId.Description: Ordinal\LunId of the disk for the Azure VM.

multiVmGroupId.Description: The multi vm group Id, if any.

multiVmGroupName.Description: The multi vm group name, if any.

activeSiteType.Description: The active location of the VM. If the VM is being protected from Azure, this field will take values from { Azure, OnPrem }. If the VM is being protected between two data-centers, this field will be OnPrem always.

sourceVmCPUCount.Description: The CPU count of the VM on the primary side.

sourceVmRAMSizeInMB.Description: The RAM size of the VM on the primary side.

vmProtectionState.Description: The protection state for the vm.

vmProtectionStateDescription.Description: The protection state description for the vm.

compressedDataRateInMB.Description: The compressed data change rate in MB.

uncompressedDataRateInMB.Description: The uncompressed data change rate in MB.

lastHeartbeat.Description: The last heartbeat received from the source server.

diskResized.Description: A value indicating whether any disk is resized for this VM.

rebootAfterUpdateStatus.Description: A value indicating whether the source server requires a restart after update.

multiVmSyncStatus.Description: A value indicating whether the multi vm sync is enabled or disabled.

agentDetails.Description: The details of the InMage agent.

discoveryType.Description: A value indicating the discovery type of the machine.

azureStorageAccountId.Description: A value indicating the underlying Azure storage account. If the VM is not running in Azure, this value shall be set to null.

datastores.Description: The data stores of the on-premise machine Value can be list of strings that contain data store names

validationErrors.Description: The validation errors of the on-premise machine Value can be list of validation errors

lastUpdateReceivedTime.Description: The last update time received from on-prem components.

replicaId.Description: The replica id of the protected item.

osVersion.Description: The OS Version of the protected item.

osVhdId.Description: The id of the disk containing the OS.

osType.Description: The type of the OS on the VM.

healthErrorCode.Description: The health error code for the disk.

resyncRequired.Description: A value indicating whether resync is required for this disk.

fileSystemCapacityInBytes.Description: The file system capacity in bytes.

sourceDataInMB.Description: The source data transit in MB.

psDataInMB.Description: The PS data transit in MB.

targetDataInMB.Description: The target data transit in MB.

diskResized.Description: A value indicating whether disk is resized.

agentUpdateStatus.Description: A value indicating whether installed agent needs to be updated.

postUpdateRebootStatus.Description: A value indicating whether reboot is required after update is applied.

enableRDPOnTargetOption.Description: The selected option to enable RDP\SSH on target vm after failover. String value of {SrsDataContract.EnableRDPOnTargetOption} enum.

useManagedDisks.Description: A value indicating whether managed disks should be used during failover.

vmProtectionState.Description: The protection state for the vm.

vmProtectionStateDescription.Description: The protection state description for the vm.

compressedDataRateInMB.Description: The compressed data change rate in MB.

uncompressedDataRateInMB.Description: The uncompressed data change rate in MB.

isAgentUpdateRequired.Description: A value indicating whether installed agent needs to be updated.

isRebootAfterUpdateRequired.Description: A value indicating whether the source server requires a restart after update.

lastHeartbeat.Description: The last heartbeat received from the source server.

multiVmSyncStatus.Description: A value indicating whether multi vm sync is enabled or disabled.

diskResized.Description: A value indicating whether any disk is resized for this VM.

sourceVmCPUCount.Description: The CPU count of the VM on the primary side.

sourceVmRAMSizeInMB.Description: The RAM size of the VM on the primary side.

osType.Description: The type of the OS on the VM.

osDiskId.Description: The id of the disk containing the OS.

recoveryAzureLogStorageAccountId.Description: The ARM id of the log storage account used for replication. This will be set to null if no log storage account was provided during enable protection.

selectedRecoveryAzureNetworkId.Description: The selected recovery azure network Id.

discoveryType.Description: A value indicating the discovery type of the machine. Value can be vCenter or physical.

datastores.Description: The data stores of the on-premise machine. Value can be list of strings that contain data store names.

targetVmId.Description: The ARM Id of the target Azure VM. This value will be null until the VM is failed over. Only after failure it will be populated with the ARM Id of the Azure VM.

licenseType.Description: License Type of the VM to be used.

validationErrors.Description: The validation errors of the on-premise machine Value can be list of validation errors.

lastUpdateReceivedTime.Description: The last update time received from on-prem components.

replicaId.Description: The replica id of the protected item.

osVersion.Description: The OS Version of the protected item.

healthErrorCode.Description: The health error code for the disk.

resyncRequired.Description: A value indicating whether resync is required for this disk.

fileSystemCapacityInBytes.Description: The disk file system capacity in bytes.

sourceDataInMegaBytes.Description: The source data transit in MB.

psDataInMegaBytes.Description: The PS data transit in MB.

targetDataInMegaBytes.Description: The target data transit in MB.

diskResized.Description: A value indicating whether disk is resized.

vmProtectionState.Description: The protection state for the vm.

vmProtectionStateDescription.Description: The protection state description for the vm.

maxSizeMB.Description: The hard disk max size in MB.

vmProtectionState.Description: The protection state for the vm.

vmProtectionStateDescription.Description: The protection state description for the vm.

vmProtectionState.Description: The protection state for the vm.

vmProtectionStateDescription.Description: The protection state description for the vm.

jobId.Description: ARM Id of the job being executed.

recoveryNetworkId.Description: The recovery network id for network mapping.

state.Description: The pairing state for network mapping.

primaryNetworkId.Description: The primary network id for network mapping.

location.Description: The Location for the Azure fabric.

containerIds.Description: The container Ids for the Azure fabric.

srsServiceEndpoint.Description: The endpoint for making requests to the SRS Service.

rcmServiceEndpoint.Description: The endpoint for making requests to the RCM Service.

processServers.Description: The list of Process Servers associated with the fabric.

masterTargetServers.Description: The list of Master Target servers associated with the fabric.

runAsAccounts.Description: The list of run as accounts created on the server.

replicationPairCount.Description: The number of replication pairs configured in this CS.

agentCount.Description: The number of source and target servers configured to talk to this CS.

systemLoad.Description: The percentage of the system load.

cpuLoad.Description: The percentage of the CPU load.

lastHeartbeat.Description: The last heartbeat received from CS server.

ipAddress.Description: The IP address of the server.

osType.Description: The OS type of the server.

agentVersion.Description: The version of the scout component on the server.

lastHeartbeat.Description: The last heartbeat received from the server.

mobilityServiceUpdates.Description: The list of the mobility service updates available on the Process Server.

machineCount.Description: The servers configured with this PS.

replicationPairCount.Description: The number of replication pairs configured in this PS.

systemLoad.Description: The percentage of the system load.

cpuLoad.Description: The percentage of the CPU load.

sslCertExpiryDate.Description: The PS SSL cert expiry date.

osVersion.Description: OS Version of the process server. Note: This will get populated if user has CS version greater than 9.12.0.0.

version.Description: The version of the latest update.

rebootStatus.Description: The reboot status of the update - whether it is required or not.

ipAddress.Description: The IP address of the server.

osType.Description: The OS type of the server.

agentVersion.Description: The version of the scout component on the server.

lastHeartbeat.Description: The last heartbeat received from the server.

retentionVolumes.Description: The retention volumes of Master target Server.

dataStores.Description: The list of data stores in the fabric.

diskCount.Description: Disk count of the master target.

osVersion.Description: OS Version of the master target.

freeSpaceInBytes.Description: The free space available in this volume.

symbolicName.Description: The symbolic name of data store.

capacity.Description: The capacity of data store in GBs.

freeSpace.Description: The free space of data store in GBs.

kekState.Description: The key encryption key state for the Vmm.

kekCertThumbprint.Description: The key encryption key certificate thumbprint.

kekCertExpiryDate.Description: The key encryption key certificate expiry date.

ipAddress.Description: The IP address of the vCenter.

runAsAccountId.Description: The account Id which has privileges to discover the vCenter.

lastHeartbeat.Description: The time when the last heartbeat was received by vCenter.

fabricArmResourceName.Description: The ARM resource name of the fabric containing this VCenter.

lastPlannedFailoverTime.Description: The start time of the last planned failover.

lastUnplannedFailoverTime.Description: The start time of the last unplanned failover.

lastTestFailoverTime.Description: The start time of the last test failover.

currentScenario.Description: Current scenario details of the protected entity.

id.Description: The ARM Id of the recovery plan protected item.

instanceType.Description: Gets the type of action details (see RecoveryPlanActionDetailsTypes enum for possible values).

pairingStatus.Description: The pairing status of this cloud.

fabricSpecificDetails.Description: Base class for fabric specific details of container.

sourceProtectionContainerFriendlyName.Description: Friendly name of source protection container.

instanceType.Description: Gets the class type. Overridden in derived classes.

providerSpecificDetails.Description: Base class for Provider specific details for policies.

recoveryPointThresholdInMinutes.Description: The recovery point threshold in minutes.

recoveryPointHistory.Description: The duration in minutes until which the recovery points need to be stored.

appConsistentFrequencyInMinutes.Description: The app consistent snapshot frequency in minutes.

multiVmSyncStatus.Description: A value indicating whether multi-VM sync has to be enabled.

crashConsistentFrequencyInMinutes.Description: The crash consistent snapshot frequency in minutes.

applicationConsistentSnapshotFrequencyIn.Description: A value indicating the application consistent frequency.

compression.Description: A value indicating whether compression has to be enabled.

initialReplicationMethod.Description: A value indicating whether IR is online.

onlineReplicationStartTime.Description: A value indicating the online IR start time.

offlineReplicationImportPath.Description: A value indicating the offline IR import path.

offlineReplicationExportPath.Description: A value indicating the offline IR export path.

replicationPort.Description: A value indicating the recovery HTTPS port.

allowedAuthenticationType.Description: A value indicating the authentication type.

replicaDeletionOption.Description: A value indicating whether the VM has to be auto deleted. Supported Values: String.Empty, None, OnRecoveryCloud
